mapper.select: SELECT r.release_order_code , r.release_code , r.warehouse_code , r.product_code , p.product_name , r.release_order_quantity , r.release_recipient_name , r.release_recipient_address , r.release_recipient_phone , r.shoppingmall_user_id , r.release_order_reg_date , c.drive_manage_code , c.delivery_member_id , c.release_order_car , c.drive_using_date , i.invoice_code , i.invoice_recipient_name , i.invoice_recipient_address , i.invoice_recipient_phone , rr.release_real_code , ra.sector_column_final_code FROM tb_release_order AS r LEFT JOIN tb_car_management AS c on r.release_order_code = c.release_order_code INNER JOIN tb_product AS p on r.product_code = p.product_code left join tb_invoice AS i ON r.release_order_code = i.release_order_code LEFT join tb_release_info AS rr on r.release_order_code = rr.release_order_code LEFT JOIN tb_release AS ra on r.release_code = ra.release_request_code;

SELECT delivery_member_id AS deliveryMemberId , warehouse_code AS warehouseCode , level_code AS levelCode , delivery_member_name AS deliveryMemberName , delivery_member_address AS deliveryMemberAddress , delivery_member_phone AS deliveryMemberPhone , ware_admin_id AS wareAdminId , delivery_reg_date AS deliveryRegDate , delivery_member_incentive AS deliveryIncentive FROM tb_delivery

SELECT r.release_real_code , r.warehouse_code , w.warehouse_name , r.sector_column_final_code , r.release_real_date , r.release_real_amount , r.ware_admin_id , r.release_reg_date , r.product_code , m.release_order_car , d.delivery_member_id , d.delivery_member_name , d.delivery_member_phone , c.car_num , i.invoice_recipient_name , i.invoice_recipient_address , i.invoice_recipient_phone , p.product_name , rr.shoppingmall_user_id FROM tb_release_info AS r LEFT JOIN tb_car_management AS m on r.release_order_code = m.release_order_code LEFT JOIN tb_invoice AS i on r.release_order_code = i.release_order_code INNER JOIN tb_delivery AS d on m.delivery_member_id = d.delivery_member_id INNER JOIN tb_car AS c on m.release_order_car = c.car_code INNER JOIN tb_product AS p on r.product_code = p.product_code INNER JOIN tb_warehouse AS w on r.warehouse_code = w.warehouse_code LEFT JOIN tb_release_order AS rr on r.release_order_code = rr.release_order_code;

SELECT i.invoice_code AS invoiceCode , i.invoice_recipient_name AS invoiceName , i.invoice_recipient_address AS invoiceAddress , s.shoppingmall_name AS shoppingmallName , p.product_name AS productName , o.release_order_quantity AS releaseOrderQuantity , d.delivery_member_name AS deliveryMemberName , d.delivery_member_phone AS deliveryMemberPhone , r.release_reg_date AS releaseRealDate FROM tb_invoice AS i INNER JOIN tb_shoppingmall_user AS s ON i.shoppingmall_user_id = s.shoppingmall_user_id INNER JOIN tb_release_order AS o ON i.release_order_code = o.release_order_code INNER join tb_product AS p ON o.product_code = p.product_code INNER JOIN tb_car_management AS c ON i.drive_manage_code = c.drive_manage_code INNER JOIN tb_delivery AS d ON c.delivery_member_id = d.delivery_member_id INNER JOIN tb_release_info AS r ON i.release_order_code = r.release_order_code WHERE invoice_code = #{invoiceCode}
